DOC.criteria: 6090 year age Living independently ( reside assist living facility ) Through test find sarcopenia Gait speed > 1 m/s Skeletal Muscle Index > 37 % men > 27.6 % woman Exclusion Criteria Responding `` yes '' question PARQ . Are currently pregnant , plan try become pregnant study Functional impairment could impede person 's ability participate resistance train program Current recent use supplement ( within past 3 month nonalanine contain supplement one year supplement contain betaalanine ) . Individuals take basic multivitamin ( without herbal coingredients ) may still allow participate . These situation review casebycase basis .
